Package org.jungrapht.visualization.transform

Class AbstractLensSupport<V,​E,​M extends LensGraphMouse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.transform.AbstractLensSupport<V,​E,​M>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vertex type
    E - edge type
    M - LensGraphMouse type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    LensSupport<M>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LayoutLensSupport, MagnifyImageLensSupport, ViewLensSupport
    public abstract class AbstractLensSupport<V,​E,​M extends LensGraphMouse>
extends Object
implements LensSupport<M>
    A class to make it easy to add an examining lens to a jungrapht graph application. See HyperbolicTransformerDemo, ViewLensSupport and LayoutLensSupport for examples of how to use it.
    Author:
    Tom Nelson
